name: Let Me In !
description: LET ME IN ! is a 3D horror survival game . The game is maze map where you have to find all the orbs ( P.s. Orbs is a circular floating ball like thing ) to escape from the ghostly haunted house . The storyline of the game starts from an over confident guy enters the maze by the urge of excitement created by the protagonist of the game " The Cat " now how will the boy gets out of the trap and will this trap be the end for the boy lets find out playing it .
